subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alfredo Despaigne hit a three-run homer in the eighth inning, helping Cuba defeat the two-time defending champion, Japan, 6-3, on Wednesday in Fukuoka, Japan.
snippet: Alfredo Despaigne hit a three-run homer in the eighth inning, helping Cuba defeat the two-time defending champion, Japan, 6-3, on Wednesday in Fukuoka, Japan.
